LanguageData.SparkSlaveRebellion.label: 노예 반란을 일으킴
LanguageData.SparkSlaveRebellion.logRulesInitiator.ru: r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] suggested they make a break for it.
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] encouraged [RECIPIENT_nameDef] to take back [RECIPIENT_possessive] freedom.
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] spoke of ending their enslavement and making a break for it.
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] spoke of a life beyond servitude and encouraged [RECIPIENT_nameDef] to escape.
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef] whispered that security was lax and now would be a good time to escape.
LanguageData.Suppress.label: 탄압
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef](이)가 [RECIPIENT_nameDef]에게 반란을 일으킬 시 처벌이 뒤따를 것이라고 말합니다.
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef](이)가 [RECIPIENT_nameDef]에게 복종하지 않으면 처벌 받을 것이라고 위협합니다.
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef]이(가) [RECIPIENT_nameDef]에게 어떤 종류의 위반도 저지르지 말라고 경고합니다.
r_logentry->[INITIATOR_nameDef](이)가 [RECIPIENT_nameDef]에게 명령은 따르고 질문은 안하는 것이 좋다고 제안합니다.
